articles.author: Rounak Jain
articles.title: India’s second largest government-owned hydrocarbon producer hit by a major cyberattack, hackers demand 196 bi - Business Insider India
articles.description: Oil India Limited (OIL) is a state-run hydrocarbon explorer headquartered in the north-eastern state of Assam. OIL says it has been hit by a major cyberattack,
articles.content:
The state-run Oil India Limited (OIL) has been hit by a major cyberattack that has compromised some of the servers of the company. The ransomware attack has hit the company’s headquarters in Assam.
